00015 namespace Unit {
00016 
00017 class UnitPathogen : public ve::DifferenceEquation::Multiple
00018 {
00019 public:
00020     UnitPathogen(
00021        const vd::DynamicsInit& atom,
00022        const vd::InitEventList& evts)
00023         : ve::DifferenceEquation::Multiple(atom, evts)
00024     {
00025         E_Init = vv::toDouble(evts.get("E_Init"));
00026         E_RateDeseaseTransmission = vv::toDouble(evts.get("E_RateDeseaseTransmission"));
00027         E_InfectiousPeriod = vv::toDouble(evts.get("E_InfectiousPeriod"));
00028         E_LatentPeriod = vv::toDouble(evts.get("E_LatentPeriod"));
00029         P_AreaMax = vv::toDouble(evts.get("P_AreaMax"));
00030         RateAreaExpansion = createSync("RateAreaExpansion");
00031         RateAreaSenescence = createSync("RateAreaSenescence");
00032         AreaSenescence = createSync("AreaSenescence");
00033         ActionTemp = createSync("ActionTemp");
00034         AreaHealthy = createVar("AreaHealthy");
00035         AreaLatent = createVar("AreaLatent");
00036         AreaInfectious = createVar("AreaInfectious");
00037         AreaRemoved = createVar("AreaRemoved");
00038         RateDeseaseTransmission = createVar("RateDeseaseTransmission");
00039     }
00040 
00041     virtual ~UnitPathogen()
00042     {}
00043 
00044 //@@begin:compute@@
00045 virtual void compute(const vd::Time& /*time*/)
00046 {
00047     // Vitesse d'infection, affectée par le microclimat et la géométrie du couvert
00048     RateDeseaseTransmission = E_RateDeseaseTransmission * ActionTemp();
00049     
00050     // Surface saine, création par la croissance, destruction par l'infection
00051     AreaHealthy = AreaHealthy(-1) +RateAreaExpansion() -(RateDeseaseTransmission() * AreaHealthy(-1));
00052     
00053     // Surface infectée, création par l'infection, destruction par la propagation du pathogène
00054     AreaLatent = AreaLatent(-1) -(E_LatentPeriod * AreaLatent(-1)) +(E_RateDeseaseTransmission * AreaHealthy(-1));
00055     
00056     // Surface infectieuse, création par la propagation du pathogène, destruction par le pathogène
00057     AreaInfectious = AreaInfectious(-1) -(E_InfectiousPeriod * AreaInfectious(-1)) +(E_LatentPeriod * AreaLatent(-1));
00058     
00059     // Surface détruite par le pathogène
00060     AreaRemoved = E_InfectiousPeriod * AreaInfectious(-1);  
00061     
00062      
00063 
00064 }
00065 //@@end:compute@@
00066 
00067 //@@begin:initValue@@
00068 virtual void initValue(const vd::Time& /*time*/)
00069 {
00070     AreaHealthy = 0.0; 
00071     AreaLatent = 0.0; 
00072     AreaInfectious = 0.0; 
00073     AreaRemoved = 0.0; 
00074         
00075 }
00076 //@@end:initValue@@
00077 
00078 private:
00079 //@@begin:user@@
00080 //@@end:user@@
00081 
00082     double E_Init;
00083     double E_RateDeseaseTransmission;
00084     double E_InfectiousPeriod;
00085     double E_LatentPeriod;
00086     double P_AreaMax; 
00087     Sync RateAreaExpansion;
00088     Sync RateAreaSenescence;
00089     Sync ActionTemp;
00090     Sync AreaSenescence;
00091     Var AreaHealthy;
00092     Var AreaLatent;
00093     Var AreaInfectious;
00094     Var AreaRemoved;
00095     Var RateDeseaseTransmission;
00096 };
